```{python}
import pandas as pd
```

### Analysis

Present your findings with interactive visualizations.

```{python}
# Create an interactive plot with Altair
chart = alt.Chart(data).mark_point().encode(
    x='x:Q',
    y='y:Q',
    color='x:Q'
).interactive()

chart
```
